Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: March 13, 2013

The Mimic is a comedy series which is centered around the life of Martin Hurdle, an unremarkable maintenance man who in fact conceals an exceptional talent. He is refered to as ‘a bit of an oddball’ but under this strange persona, hides an uncanny ability to mimic voices.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34788)
